revised_title: Feeding, Digestion, Excretion, and Food Storage in Peripatopsis
tldr: This study examines the feeding, digestion, excretion, and food storage mechanisms of Peripatopsis, a type of Onychophora. The research was conducted on specimens collected in South Africa and involved observing their feeding habits, analyzing their digestive enzymes, and studying their organ structures. The findings provide a better understanding of the biology of Peripatopsis and its related species.
